MemberSignature.Value: public void SoftReset ();
.method public hidebysig instance void SoftReset() cil managed
Public Sub SoftReset ()
member this.SoftReset : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Perform a soft reset. The configuration data of the internal buffer remains unchanged.All registers are set to the reset values.This command automatically terminates when finished.
Docs.remarks: The SerialSpeedReg register is reset and therefore the serial data rate is set to 9600 baud.
